description: Scientists have detected heavy water in the planet-forming disk around young star V883 Orionis, confirming the water existed long before the star formed. The discovery, made using ALMA, shows that water’s origins trace back to ancient interstellar clouds, linking molecular gas, comets, and planetary systems across billions of years.
title: Astronomers Detect Heavy Water in Planet-Forming Disk Around Young Star

description: MIT researchers have discovered rare isotopic traces of a “proto Earth” that existed before the giant impact that shaped our modern planet. Found deep in ancient rocks, these potassium isotope signatures reveal remnants of Earth’s earliest material, offering fresh insight into the planet’s formation and the solar system’s earliest history.
title: MIT Detects Traces of a Lost ‘Proto Earth’ Deep Beneath Our Planet’s Surface

description: A NASA study suggests that traces of ancient life could be locked in Martian ice. Lab tests freezing bacteria under Mars-like radiation revealed amino acids can persist for tens of millions of years. Researchers say pure ice offers protection, making Mars’ frozen regions ideal for searching preserved biomolecules.
title: NASA Experiment Shows Martian Ice Could Preserve Signs of Ancient Life

description: From Jakarta to Virginia, cities are adopting innovative ways to fight land sinking — from China’s sponge city initiative to the U.S. SWIFT program and European wet farming — offering real hope that urban landscapes can rise again and restore natural balance.
title: Global Projects Aim to Save Sinking Cities From Rising Seas and Climate Change

description: Comet SWAN (C/2025 R2), discovered via NASA’s SOHO spacecraft, is rapidly brightening as it nears its October 20–21 Earth flyby. Skywatchers should look to the western horizon after sunset to spot its vivid green coma and tail — possibly visible to the naked eye in dark conditions.
title: NASA Confirms Brightening Comet SWAN Could Be Visible With Binoculars: When and Where to See It

description: “We Live in Time,” directed by John Crowley and starring Andrew Garfield and Florence Pugh, beautifully portrays the journey of two souls bound by love and fate. After its acclaimed theatrical run, the film will premiere on Lionsgate Play on October 17, 2025, offering an emotional cinematic experience.
title: We Live in Time OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Andrew Garfield and Florence Pugh Romance

description: Imbam is a Malayalam movie that has finally made its way to the digital screens after 2 years of its theatrical release. The movie stars Deepal Parambol, Lalu Alex, and Meera Vasudevan in the key roles.
title: Imbam Is Now Streaming Online: Know Everything About This Deepak Parambol Starrer Malayali Drama

description: A Permanent Account Number or PAN Card is a crucial document to hold in India for identification purposes.  If you’ve applied for a new PAN Card online or filled out a request for a PAN Card reprint, there are multiple ways to check the status of the application, through both NSDL and UTITSL. Here's a step-by-step guide.
title: How to Check PAN Card Status Online: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: OnePlus 15’s launch in China is only a week away. The much-anticipated debut of the Chinese tech firm’s next flagship phone is set for October 27. It is confirmed to be powered by the latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, the same as the flagship handsets from Xiaomi. Although the key features and pricing of the phone have been leaking online for a while, various technical specifications of the handset remain under wraps. The phone is also confirmed to be unveiled in India soon.
title: OnePlus 15: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More
